org.simplecorporation.myengine.core.image

Class ImagePack

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simplecorporation.myengine.core.image.ImagePack

  • public class ImagePack
extends java.lang.Object
    The ImagePack class can load and store images to be used at a later date. When using Java2D (OpenGL = false) there is a rendering flash when rendering an image for the first time, this class can help prevent that issue.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> imageIds
      A LinkedList containing all of the images id's in the ImagePack

      A LinkedList containing all of the images names in the ImagePack
      private java.util.LinkedList<Image> images
      A LinkedList containing all of the images in the ImagePack
      private int packId
      The id of the ImagePack
      private java.lang.String packName
      The name of the ImagePack
